reviewText: extremely detailed useful information for drumstick grip and the mechanics of how to hit the drums for maximum results.

It seems that previous reviews on this great DVD have been mixed,but I rather enjoyed it myself!!! One must remember that this DVD is called Snare Drum Basics,okay!!! Yes,it's only around 35 short minutes but it still shows some great snare drum basics!!! Nice instuctor/teacher too!!! Great for the beginning drummer!!! Two thumbs up!!! Five stars!!! A+

I picked up this DVD in the hopes to learning more about basic playing concepts with the snare drum.  I was fairly dissappointed that this was just more of a high level overview and not very specific.  They did glance over a lot of the basics and as most instructional DVD's, they don't take the time to break down the concepts, the just blow through it.  DVD was very short...I am not really sure who could benefit from this DVD.
